divs: Sighting DetailsI was at the park in Bridgton, Maine. And me and my friend Spyro were having aconversation. We were facing each other when i saw something flying across thesky over his head. At first I thought it was a shooting star but then I thoughtto myself that it was way too bright to be one and the fact that it fadded inand out twice. Ok, so there I was talking to Spyro when suddenly this lightappears in the sky. It looked like a giant fireball about the size of an asprin.It was going what mustve been a 1000 miles an hour cause planes done move thatfast when there that far away and they go 600. This thing was moving about aninch a second. Almost as soon as i saw it I told Spyro to look behind him. Butthen when he look it kinda sped up and faded away. It was flying in an archuntil it just dissapeared. It all took place for about 20 seconds. After that meand Spyro were like, Oh my god we just saw a ufo!

Summary: I saw a silvery white sphere with my friend spryo
